@AkitoH Thanks for great explain and reminder what is NTR. Yeah it's NTR and waiting for english version to know those dialogues. Probably in english it will be more obvious that it is NTR.

Some people really need to understand what NTR is in hentai. It's not just about a love interest being stolen. It's about the level of jealousy, helplessness and emotion it brings out of the focus character. In this case, they both liked her, but his friend was confident enough to go after her first, which the MC is taken off guard by and is visibly shaken and can't do anything cause he lost. That, in it's purest form, is NTR. 

I'm sort of indifferent to NTR plots, cause almost all of them are the same nonsense. I've seen about 7 plots like this with the hesitant MC is too slow and the confident best friend wins the day. "Entanglement" by Katsura Airi being one of them. This is nothing new, but Jyura's art still reigns supreme. Great fap.
